page.title: 05LIFESTYLES
page.content: There are 3 categories of people these are the retired,middleaged people i.e.professional people- farmers,doctors,teachers;and their children. The retired enjoy the peacefulness and relaxed atmosphere of the villages.They do not mind the lack of immediate amenities as they can go to Barrow or Ulverston.For entertainment they can go to nearby public houses at Rampside,Baycliff,Leece or Gleaston. The professional people use the villages only for accommodation i.e. they travel to work daily,usually to Barrow,then return home at night.They prefer the seclusion of the villages to the hustle of a town life but the town life is essential for employment,shopping,entertainment etc.
